create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_CHILDLIST ( @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID uniqueidentifier ) as begin set nocount on;
declare @interactionCategoryName_ChildFieldMemo nvarchar(100) = 'Child Field Memo' declare @interactionCategoryID_ChildFieldMemo uniqueidentifier = null declare @interactionCategoryChildFieldMemoIDError nvarchar(255) = 'Could not find the interaction category - ' + @interactionCategoryName_ChildFieldMemo
declare @interactionCategoryName_ChildLetter nvarchar(100) = 'Child Letters' declare @interactionCategoryID_ChildLetter uniqueidentifier = null declare @interactionCategoryChildLetterIDError nvarchar(255) = 'Could not find the interaction category - ' + @interactionCategoryName_ChildLetter
begin try select @interactionCategoryID_ChildFieldMemo = ID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower (NAME) = lower (@interactionCategoryName_ChildFieldMemo) if @interactionCategoryID_ChildFieldMemo is null RAISERROR 1000000 @interactionCategoryChildFieldMemoIDError
select @interactionCategoryID_ChildLetter = ID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower (NAME) = lower (@interactionCategoryName_ChildLetter) if @interactionCategoryID_ChildLetter is null RAISERROR 1000000 @interactionCategoryChildLetterIDError
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
select INTERACTION.ID, INTERACTION.EXPECTEDDATE, (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.INTERACTIONTYPECODE where ID = INTERACTION.INTERACTIONTYPECODEID) as CONTACTMETHOD, cat.NAME as INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY, subcat.NAME as INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY, INTERACTION.STATUS, INTERACTION.FUNDRAISERID as OWNERID, fr_const.Name as OWNERNAME, FIELDMEMODATESENT, (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFIELDMEMOSENTCODE where ID = int_ext.FIELDMEMOSENTCODEID) as FIELDMEMOSENT, (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONHOLDREASONCODE where ID = int_ext.HOLDREASONCODEID) as HOLDREASON, (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONUNUSABLEITEMCODE where ID = int_ext.UNUSABLECODEID) as UNUSABLE, 'b525985b-be02-4f02-a9b8-c110411cf936' as VIEWFORMID from dbo.INTERACTION join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION int_ext on int_ext.ID = INTERACTION.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID = so_child.CONSTITUENTID
left join dbo.CONSTITUENT fr_const on fr_const.ID = INTERACTION.FUNDRAISERID left join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat on subcat.ID = INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID left join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY cat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.ID
where so_child.ID = @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID and INTERACTION.ISINTERACTION = 1 and cat.ID in (@interactionCategoryID_ChildFieldMemo, @interactionCategoryID_ChildLetter)
return 0 end
